messages.message: The ultimate answer of why is it not in the product comes down to the product roadmap. There are many competing priorities, and they are typically decided on at the start of the quarter (barring any major new information). If the item isn’t listed in the roadmap, then we’re not working on it.
This particular ask is in the H1 FY22 roadmap now :slightly_smiling_face:

Here is an important thing to note -- usability is not just the UI, if the target persona for us is developers, how they can really access and manipulate different document elements/components (pages, paragraphs, tables, key-values, etc.) are as critical as anything else . Even for FormRecognizer to be effective, we need to be able to access the right segment of the document, or its post-processed component/segment. It would be hard for PMs to be able to know all these details, without having spent time building real customer applications, and this has to be pushed by Eng Leads.
